name: Hotel Panic
description:
Be quick and don't let the bandits escape!

Hotel Panic is a game of agility.
You must look after the safety of hotel guests and arrest as much bandits as you can, but be careful not to arrest any guest by mistake.

- Many itens to customize your hotel
- Upgrades to improve your performance
- Amazing graphics
- Game Center integrated (Achievements + Leaderboards)

Become a fan of Ludic Side on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/LudicSide

Follow Ludic Side on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/LudicSide
developers: Ludic Side Tecnologia da Informacao LTDA
